    		Information Technology
    	Welcome to the Division of Information Technology!  In 2022, Chico State hit an exciting milestone when Information Resources was reorganized out of Academic Affairs into a standalone division of IT, and we recruited our inaugural Vice President of Information Technology and Chief Information Officer (VPIT/CIO), Dr. Monique Sendze. Our organizational name has changed from Information Resources to Information Technology, and we're already working on many exciting plans to take technology services to the next level and evolve our service portfolio to strategically leverage technology opportunities to provide new value to the University. But in the meantime, we're continuing to provide the same comprehensive IT services that you've come to rely on including services to support teaching and learning, research, and university business operations.This website includes information about the nine major departments/areas(opens in new window) that make up the Division of IT, and information about how to request services(opens in new window). In the coming months, we'll be working on updates to our website to provide more information as well as communicating our organizational/service changes to campus. Intro to VPIT/CIO Monique SendzeStaff and Student SpotlightFebruary 2022Staff Spotlight: Craig Bentley(opens in new window)Student Spotlight: Iris Lopez LopezHow to Request Services from IT

We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
